page.title: 13THE UPWOOD WHEELWRIGHTS
page.content: There were two wheelwrights who were brothers.They lived in Upwood and were partners in trade.A wheelwright is a person who fits metal rims onto cartwheels.Their house burnt down but they had a metal,gold coloured sun on their house,so if a fire engine was passing by it would stop and put the fire out.If it didn't have a sun on it the fire engine would go straight by.There is a new house on the site of the old one and the sun has been put on it.The house has caught fire a number of times.On one occasion,a fire was caused by a spark which flew up from the road,while people tarred the road.Luckily no-one was killed. _ by Ella and Bronwyn.
